CHAT.comment: MINISTRY OF DEFENSE AND SUPPORT FOR THE ARMED FORCES OF THE ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF IRAN, Petitioner v. DARIUSH ELAHI.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID J. BEDERMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DOUGLAS HALLWARD-DRIEMEIER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MR. DAVID J. BEDERMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:09 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
